attributes.action: Deport all foreign criminals with lifetime ban from UK
attributes.additional_details: Sick to death of the crimes perpetrated by foreign criminals
attributes.background: Stop putting our country in more danger

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. It's already a requirement for the Home Secretary to seek the deportation of foreign national offenders, other than in limited circumstances. You can read more here:

https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/research-briefings/cbp-8062/

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
